CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 8, 1958, pg. 1 reads: "To Work Downtown - Following Courier articles, concerning integration and upgrading of Negro city patrolmen, Director of Public Safety Louis Rosenberg, Saturday, assigned Patrolmen Emmanuel Williams, top, to ambulance duty; and Sherman Cross, center, and Wendell Allen, bottom, to downtown beats. All three will work different turns at Central Police Station. - Harris photos."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Pittsburgh Police Patrolman, Wendall Allen, badge no. 980, posed in domestic interior
